$id string The ID of this controller yii\base\Controller

$enableCsrfValidation boolean Whether to enable CSRF validation for the actions in this controller yii\web\Controller
$actionParams array The parameters bound to the current action yii\web\Controller
$generator yii\gii\Generator yii\gii\controllers\DefaultController
$behaviors yii\base\Behavior[] list of behaviors attached to this component yii\gii\controllers\DefaultController
$uniqueId string the controller ID that is prefixed with the module ID (if any) yii\gii\controllers\DefaultController
$route string the route (module ID, controller ID and action ID) of the current request yii\gii\controllers\DefaultController
$view yii\base\View the view object that can be used to render views or view files yii\gii\controllers\DefaultController
$viewPath string the directory containing the view files for this controller yii\gii\controllers\DefaultController
$canonicalUrl string the canonical URL of the currently requested page yii\gii\controllers\DefaultController

actionAction() method
mixed actionAction( $id, $name )
$id string The ID of the generator
$name string The action name
return mixed the result of the action.
throws yii\web\NotFoundHttpException if the action method does not exist.

Runs an action defined in the generator.

Given an action named "xyz", the method "actionXyz()" in the generator will be called. If the method does not exist, a 400 HTTP exception will be thrown.

void createActionUrl( $name, $params = [] )
$name
$params

loadGenerator() method
yii\gii\Generator loadGenerator( $id )
$id string The ID of the generator to be loaded.
return yii\gii\Generator the loaded generator
throws yii\web\NotFoundHttpException

Loads the generator with the specified ID.
